metadata.name: Priestess of Bell
metadata.description:
This art expresses the beauty of the shrine maiden as a shining existence at night, imagining the mysterious beauty of Japan. 
Kagura bells illuminate the night and the moon and the light of fireflies resonate and illumine the darkness.
The shrine maiden brings light to all evils.

日本の神秘的な美しさをイメージし、夜に光り輝く存在として、巫女の美しを表現したアートです。
夜を照らす神楽鈴と、蛍の光が共鳴し、闇を照らします。
巫女はあらゆる邪気へ光をもたらします。

This art is based on the theme chosen by the snapshot vote of "KARIN DAO" by KRN.
